mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_TRADE VALUES ( MEMBER_TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{type}, #{id}, NULL, NULL, NULL, SYSDATE, 2000, #{impUid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = '입금' AND TRADE_SUCCESS_CODE IN (SELECT TRADE_SUCCESS_CODE FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE ID = #{id})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE (SELECT TRADE_SUCCESS_CODE FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE ID = #{id}) IN (SELECT TRADE_SUCCESS_CODE FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE TRADE_TYPE = '출금')) WHERE TRADE_TYPE = '출금'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT V.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER_TRADE WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY TRADE_NO DESC))V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{cPage} AND #{numPerPage}
